content: the free pattern comes in 2 brim sizes 6″ wide brim the yellow hat and 5″ brim the blue hat the beach / sun hat is crochet from raffia yarn raffia with passion with a 2 5 mm crochet hook in single_crochet stitches work from crown to brim edge materials & tools 1 crochet raffia yarns raffia with passion 2 rolls 2 crochet hook 2 5mm 3 stitch marker 4 tapestry needle 5 fishing line nylon size 100 lbs diameter is roughly 1 mm 120 yards 6 adhesive tape 7 lace trim 1 5″ wide 1 25 yard 8 leather cord 3mm 1 25 yard 9 warm iron
